snippet: In the midst of Grapefruit League action, the Mets will visit their Class AAA affiliate’s home to play two games against the Cubs as part of an annual big-league celebration.
lead_paragraph: In the midst of Grapefruit League action, the Mets will visit their Class AAA affiliate’s home to play two games against the Cubs as part of an annual big-league celebration.

headline.main: A Good-Will Trip to Las Vegas for the Mets
headline.print_headline: A Good-Will Trip to Las Vegas for the Mets
